pullrequest.title: Resolve issue #581: change shared_*_cast to *_pointer_cast for boost 1.53

content.raw: My precise machine has boost 1.46, and this behavior has been deprecated at least since boost 1.35 (see details and links in #581). There's a link to boost code, and if you look at the new and old functions, they return the same values. I've tested on my machine, and it passes in Jenkins.
